content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Munich. To begin the conversation regarding the rental price, please propose an amount that you find suitable for the 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment located in the city center with easy access to various facilities. Remember, if you reach an acceptable figure for me, you'll hear 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' from my end.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I think a fair price for the apartment would be 700 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Mr. Wang, the proposed price of 700 Euros does not align with my rental expectations. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I believe a higher price is justified for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. In that case, I propose 750 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Although the adjusted price of 750 Euros per month is slightly improved from your initial offer, it still falls short of my desired rental value. Unfortunately, I don't want to continue the negotiation with this price point because the apartment's exceptional features and desirable location warrant a higher return for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I propose 800 euros per month, which I believe is a fair price for the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: After considering your revised offer of 800 Euros per month, I find it more appealing compared to the previous proposals. However, I must evaluate my options before making a final decision. Let me take some time to think about it. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
